story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_01: Hm... Where should we start looking?
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_03:
You’re able to stay calm, even when I’m about to
betray you?
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_04: Betray me? Are you sure about that?
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_05:
I didn’t sense any ill will from you or
your Toxicroak.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_06: Hmph. So that’s what you think?
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_07:
I’ll admit, we weren’t actually harboring any ill
will toward you.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_08: I simply wanted to battle you.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_10:
Because when we fought back in Sinnoh, I couldn’t
defeat you.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_11: In terms of skill, you may be on par with our boss.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_12:
Perhaps it’s my curiosity as a Trainer that makes
me wonder what the secret to your power is.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_13:
But what was I thinking, when our boss is facing
a crisis?
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_15:
Cyrus is important to you. I get that. But you have
to take care of yourself just as much.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_16:
You can’t just keep pushing your own feelings
aside for everyone else.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_17: Barry and Lucas are my precious friends...
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_18:
But I think it’s great that we can tell each other
what we want to do, even if it’s a little selfish or
it leads to an argument.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_19:
If you don’t do that, you can’t let your friends
know when they’re doing something wrong.
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_21: Because...a lot can happen in life, you know?
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_22:
And I’d be more than happy to share my
secret to getting stronger!
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_24:
After all, we’re on Pasio—a place where sync
pairs are free to battle and form as many
connections with others as they want!
story_teamgalactic_02_07000/2401_1201_27:
Very well. Once we’ve successfully extricated
Master Cyrus from this mess, I’ll have you tell me
everything about your little secret.
